result.title: Architecture and Interface Design
result.description: Report on the architecture that will be adopted for integrating all technologies under the joint cause of supporting the story telling engine. Mockups specifying the design and workflow of the final application will be also included, discussing how they manage to address the functional requirements reported in D2.2

result.title: Report on the Static and Aerial Sensors
result.description: Deliverable reporting on the drone hover motion control/determination, as well as on the lab tests performed with the static sensor. The report will summarize our findings in statistically characterising the motion of the drones and investigating appropriate time-averaging techniques to reduce stand-off error caused by the static oscillation of the drone when hovering. It will also incorporate the pre-evaluation results of static sensor performed by the museum partners

result.title: Initial Version of the Algorithms for 3D Semantics Extraction and Content Interlinking
result.description: Software implementation and documentation of the algorithms that will be used for 3D semantics extraction and content interlinking. The specifications of these algorithms will be derived by the functional requirements and story plots defined in WP2.
